content:
Hi All,
While going through the criteria for FHIR APIs in ONC Certification. Still trying to figure out out the timeline aspect which says by Dec 2022. Does this means product shall be released and upgraded at all existing deployments by that time or it is product shall be ready by that time.
@Shubham Sharma Maybe you can get better answer at #united states stream.
Thanks @Yunwei Wang for guiding, was not aware of that stream.
